item.title: PostgreSQL_PostGIS_Notes_1
item.description: PostgreSQL / PostGIS Notes (1) All contents are from Carto Academy Tutorial: Learning SQL through the CARTO Editor 1. the_geom In our case, we have a point type geometry with coordinates at the values listed. Note that longitude is first and latitude is second, similar to (x,y) from plotting in a Cartesian coordinate plane. Just like there are different coordinate systems besides Cartesian (e.g., polar, spherical, etc.), maps have different coordinate systems, or projections.
